actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Daylight Saving Time Energy Conservation Act of 1973, to provide that the advanced standard time requirement of such act shall not be in effect during periods which have a small number of daylight hours.

summary.text: Provides that the advanced standard time requirement of the Emergency Daylight Saving Time Energy Conservation Act of 1973 shall not be in effect during the period November 1, 1974, to February 28, 1975.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency Daylight Saving Time Energy Conservation Act of 1973, to provide that the advanced standard time requirement of such act shall not be in effect during periods which have a small number of daylight hours.
